messages.minionCannotReach: A %type% minion cannot reach and has stopped spawning!
messages.minionIsFull: 당신 Minion의 수납 공간이 꽉 찼습니다!
messages.wantToViewPatchNotes: Need support or want to read the full changelog?

update.majorAvailable: A new major update (%version%) is available! The link for the download can be found in chat.
update.patchAvailable: A new patch update (%version%) is available! Look in chat for download options!

messages.cancelledStemBreak: A feature has stopped you from breaking this stem. Use your bare hand if you'd like to actually break it.
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: A feature has stopped you from opening this player's profile since you were holding a bow.
messages.cancelledDropping: A feature has stopped you from dropping this "rare" item or tool from your hotbar.
messages.clickMoreTimes: Click/drop this item %times% more times if you really want to do this.
messages.clickOneMoreTime: Click/drop this item 1 more time if you really want to do this.
messages.cancelledDeepCaverns: A feature has stopped you from mining this block here.
messages.switchedSlots: You have just switched from a locked slot or rare item. Please wait a bit before dropping!
messages.clickToOpenFolder: Click to open your mods folder!
messages.firstStatus: This status will appear at the top
messages.secondStatus: This status will appear under your first status
messages.fallbackStatus: This status will appear when your automatic status has nothing to show
messages.cancelledPark: A feature has stopped you from breaking this block here.
messages.bossApproaching: You are close to spawning a boss!
messages.copyModeSet: The developer copy mode has been set to: %mode%. Press "%keyName%" to trigger a data copy!

discordStatus.descriptionPurse: Shows the amount of coins in your purse
discordStatus.descriptionStats: Shows your HP, Defense and Mana stats
discordStatus.descriptionItem: Shows the name of the item you're holding
discordStatus.descriptionTime: Shows the current Skyblock time. E.g. 12:00am 1st Early Winter
discordStatus.descriptionAuto: Automatically displays a status. E.g. your zealot count while in The End.
discordStatus.descriptionRevenants: Shows that you are doing a Revenant quest.
discordStatus.descriptionSvens: Shows that you are doing a Sven quest.
discordStatus.descriptionTarantula: Shows that you are doing a Tarantula quest.

copyBlock.help: §e(Dev) §7Copies data about the block that you are looking at

copyEntity.help: §e(Dev) §7Copy NBT data for entities of the given name(s) within the given radius around the player

detailedHelp.description: Copies the NBT data of entities. The types of entities included and the radius around the player to copy data from can be customized. If no options are given, the default settings are used. The default settings are: include players, armor stands, and mobs, and a radius of 3 blocks. If the radius isn't given, the default radius is used.

options.entityNames: Names of the types of entities you want to copy data for (e.g. Player,Creeper). Press "Tab" after typing the command for a full list. Separate multiple names with commas, names are case-sensitive.
options.radius: The radius (in blocks) around the player to copy entity NBT data from

detailedHelp.description: Copies the text displayed in the scoreboard's sidebar display slot

options.formatted: Determines if the formatting codes should be included when copying. Can be either "true" or "false", defaults to "false" if no value is provided. Formatting codes are copied if "true".

copyTabList.help: §e(Dev) §7Copy the tab list header and footer

detailedHelp.description: This command copies the header and footer of the tab player list. Formatting codes are included.
This command toggles developer mode. This mode is meant for developers Skyblock mods/tools. It provides raw data from the game such as entity and item NBT.

dev.enabled: Developer mode enabled! TIP: Press "%keyName%" to copy NBT data!

folder.error: An error occurred trying to open the mods folder: %s

help.help: Show this help message. If a command is provided, detailed help about that command is shown.

options.command: the sub-command to get detailed usage for

detailedHelp.description: Manually sets counts in the zealot counter.

options.zealots: Zealots killed since the last summoning eye drop

zealotCounter.eyesSet: Set total summoning eye count to %number%!

slayer.help: Manually set slayer stats, press tab for arguments

detailedHelp.description: Manually set slayer stats, press tab for arguments

options.number: Number to set the stat to
options.stat: Slayer stat to change, can be "kills" or the name of a dropped item formatted like this: "REVENANT_FLESH"

slayer.bossRequired: You need to select a boss! Please choose %bosses%
slayer.statRequired: You need to select a stat. Press tab for options.
slayer.numberRequired: You need to add the number you want.
slayer.killsSet: Kills for slayer %boss% was set to %number%.
slayer.statSet: Statistic %stat% for slayer %boss% was set to %number%.

toggleActionBarLogging.disabled: Action bar messages will no longer be logged.
toggleActionBarLogging.enabled: Action bar messages will now be logged.
